name: Galaxy S7
details: The Samsung Galaxy S7 knows no limits. Watch videos in crisp clarity on the 5.1 inch Quad HD Super AMOLED display and enjoy PC-quality gaming thanks to Vulkan API support.

name: iPhone SE 16GB
details: 12MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels and True Tone flash. A9 chip with integrated M9 motion coprocessor.

name: Signature 18ct; Red and Gold Stainless Steel Mobile Phone, Black
details: Meticulously handcrafted from the finest rare materials to the label's uncompromising standards, Signature is the outstanding, elementary expression of Vertu’s vision.

name: Pixel
details: Meet Pixel, a phone by Google. It’s the first phone with the Google Assistant built in. Ask it questions. Tell it to do things.

name: Galaxy S6
details: Samsung Galaxy S6 SM-G 920 unlocked smartphone 32 GB. This is a refurbished samsung galaxy s 6 smartphone this phone will show visible signs of handling such as some scratches.

name: iPhone 4S
details: Works with multiple GSM Carriers; No Contract! MicroSIM Slot Quad-Band UMTS/HSDPA+ 800MHz ARM Cortex-A9 Apple A5 Dual-Core Processor.

name: GalaxyS4
